changelog:
- BeastROMs v. 1.6
- August Google security patch (Android-9.0.0_r47)
- Added back allow to customize notification led light
- Added 18 more styles for QS
- Switch to BLACK Google animation 
- Added DANYCOM APN
- SmartActions: Add media controls to bindable actions
- Q style: Port Android Q lock icon on lock screen 
- KeyguardHostView: Auto face unlock v2
- BoostFramework : Add an Update Hint on App update
- OP gestures: add swipe start height setting
- base: Import rest of animation from Pixel's Q4 preview image
- Clock: Fix hiding of right clock on lockscreen
- Fix StatusBar icons tinting when in split screen
- Android Q style Wifi icons
- QS tiles: Update icons from Android Q
- Keyguard: Hide check button when using PIN quick unlock
- Other fixes and system optimizations
-Fixed network fluctuations
